subject: Product Question
description_text:
Good Morning, I wanted to ask if the "Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulator Pedal
with Baseplate" already comes with the baseplate or if I still have to add
it separately. Thankyou for your time.
[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi D1NONLY JCOB,  Please provide the link and I’ll help you check it.

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pedal-pro-plus-with-baseplate?variant=50297610862906

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 4:45 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi D1NONLY JCOB,  I apologize for the delayed response.    This link includes the base plate by default.
